name: sessionhub-plugin
description: Claude Code plugin for capturing AI development sessions via standalone Go CLI

scripts.build:go-cli: ROOT=$(pwd) && mkdir -p "$ROOT/.cache/go-build" && cd go-cli && GOCACHE="$ROOT/.cache/go-build" go build -o ../bin/sessionhub ./cmd/sessionhub
scripts.test:go: ROOT=$(pwd) && mkdir -p "$ROOT/.cache/go-build" && cd go-cli && GOCACHE="$ROOT/.cache/go-build" go test ./...

author: SessionHub
